Calendars & Schedules Read More                    NYU myTime Tracking time worked and time off balances Read More                    Accessing & Managing Payroll Information View your payslips, Manage direct deposit, IRS Form W-2 and prior payslip information Read More               The Payroll Department is responsible for:     Processing all employee wages and stipends payments     Withholding all appropriate taxes on wages   Filing payroll tax reports   Deducting benefits and other authorized items from employee wages                                                          For questions related to Payroll, HR and Benefits        Ask PeopleLink                   Email : askpeoplelink@nyu.edu   Phone: 212-992-LINK (5465) or 2-LINK              Visit PeopleLink                                   Direct Deposit for payroll and stipends now in        PeopleSync                     Go to "Payment Elections" in PeopleSync to sign up for Direct Deposit   Once enrolled, pay advises will appear under "Payslips"   PeopleSync resides in the Work Tab and Academics Tab in NYUHome              For more info visit PeopleSync                   Related Forms       Authorization To Receive Paychecks (DIS1000)   Payroll Off-Cycle Request Form   Retroactive Cost Allocation Form (.xlsx) ( only for adjustments prior to 4/1/14 for WSQ and 9/1/14 for SOE)
